00227 
00228 // do not use these directly!
00229 extern const int s_colors[][3];
00230 
00235 inline int getRed( imageColor color ) {
00236    return s_colors[ color ][ 0 ];
00237 }
00238 
00243 inline int getGreen( imageColor color ) {
00244    return s_colors[ color ][ 1 ];
00245 }
00246 
00251 inline int getBlue( imageColor color ) {
00252    return s_colors[ color ][ 2 ];
00253 }
00254 
00260 inline void getRGB( imageColor color, RGB& rgb ) {
00261    rgb.red = getRed( color );
00262    rgb.green = getGreen( color );
00263    rgb.blue = getBlue( color );
00264 }
00265 
00271 inline RGB getRGB( imageColor color ) {
00272    return RGB( getRed( color ), getGreen( color ), getBlue( color ) );
00273 }
00274 
00276 enum CoolColor {
00277    VALUE = 0
00278 };
00279 
00283 inline CoolColor makeColor( imageColor color ) {
00284    return
00285       static_cast< CoolColor >( ( ( getRed( color ) << 16 ) & 0xFF0000 ) |
00286                                 ( ( getGreen( color ) << 8 ) & 0x00FF00 ) |
00287                                 ( ( getBlue( color ) ) & 0x0000FF ) );
00288 }
00289
